meanings.english_definition: (zoology) Belonging or pertaining to the Aporobranchia.
(zoology) An animal belonging to the Aporobranchia.

usage_notes.explanation: This term is highly specialized and used within the field of zoology, specifically when discussing classifications of certain marine animals.

readability_explanation.text: This word is highly technical and specific to the field of zoology. It would not be encountered in general language use.
